subject: Re: Flock/Axon
body:

wow! I love it! Lucky Randy, haha!
	
 
Caroline Fraher
Regional Account Executive II

On Wed, Feb 5, 2025 at 3:15?PM DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov > wrote:


	Thanks for the information.  I just sat down with Oregon Community Credit Union�s CEO.  They agreed to put at least one at every branch in Oregon (15-ish) and already have a meeting scheduled with Randy.  I believe SELCO Community Credit Union will be doing the same.  I have a lot of businesses reaching out.  I wouldn�t be surprised to get another 50 over the next year or so from private entities.  

	
	Derek

	 

	Detective D. DeWitt

	Financial Crimes Unit

	Special Weapons and Tactics Team

	Background Investigations Team

	Eugene Police Department

	300 County Club Road

	Eugene, OR 97401

	Work hours: Tuesday - Friday 7:30 a.m. � 5:30 p.m.

	Desk Phone � 541-682-2682

	Work Cell � 541-743-6192

	 

	From: Caroline Fraher <caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com > 
	Sent: Wednesday, February 5, 2025 2:55 PM
	To: DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov >
	Subject: Fwd: Flock/Axon

	 

	[EXTERNAL ?]

	passing along to you too!

	
 

Caroline Fraher
Regional Account Executive II



 https://www.instagram.com/flocksafety/ 
 <https://cdn.gifo.wisestamp.com/s/rfm1/108062/26/trans.png>  310-844-3659 call/text <tel:310-844-3659call/text>    <https://cdn.gifo.wisestamp.com/s/rfw4/108062/26/trans.png>  flocksafety.com 

 <https://cdn.gifo.wisestamp.com/s/rfcustom/108062/26/trans.png>  caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com 

	
 

	
 https://www.flocksafety.com/articles/200-vs-400-feet-dfr?utm_campaign=EmailSignature&utm_source=LETSM&utm_medium=Wisestamp 

	
 

	 <https://tracy.srv.wisestamp.com/px/wsid/jV4JgeOn3bN1.png> 

	 

	---------- Forwarded message ---------
	From: Caroline Fraher <caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com >
	Date: Wed, Feb 5, 2025 at 2:38?PM
	Subject: Flock/Axon
	To: BURKE Jacob T <JBurke@eugene-or.gov JBurke@eugene-or.gov >

	 

	 

	Hi Captain Burke,

	Thanks again for your time yesterday. Here are some points to share with the rest of the team regarding the recent Flock and Axon announcement. These points are from our CEO, Garrett Langley.

	
	
	

	1/ We will always provide open APIs � this includes to competitors like Moto, Axon, Utility, etc
	2/ It's a Fusus choice if they continue using our APIs, and they have indicated they expect to continue using our APIs (what some customers have told me)
	3/ It�s unclear what Axon wants as they have not communicated to us, and its seems they plan to block Flock from using certain Axon APIs
	So we will not block Axon, it seems they might block us for some reason

	 

	If there is any pause for concern regarding the Flock and Eugene PD project, please let me know. Garrett has personally offered to reach out and discuss this with you all as well. 

	
 

Caroline Fraher
Regional Account Executive II



 https://www.instagram.com/flocksafety/

 <https://cdn.gifo.wisestamp.com/s/rfcustom/108062/26/trans.png>  caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com 

	
 

	
 https://www.flocksafety.com/articles/200-vs-400-feet-dfr?utm_campaign=EmailSignature&utm_source=LETSM&utm_medium=Wisestamp 

	
 

	 <https://tracy.srv.wisestamp.com/px/wsid/jV4JgeOn3bN1.png>
